member.summary: Called by the containing wizard if the user clicks Finish. The wizard page should complete any operations requested by the user.

member.summary: Called by the containing wizard if the user clicks Cancel. The wizard page should undo any temporary changes made during the wizard.

member.summary: Title text for this page, typically shown in boldface.
